__e: The greatest hero in the world told me to help people without being violent, and I promised I would do that and not let him down.
Because he was a very violent man, and at the same time, I love him very much.
I don't like being violent, but he makes me do it.
He's violent but he's like the everyman in a weird way.
I'm not a fighting man, but there's a time and a place for everything.
Most violent game I've ever seen.
Your mom tells me he was a little abusive, that he wasn't such a nice guy.
And my dad, our dad, he was the most violent man I've ever known.
I have an even crazier friend in the car behind us.
Ah, don't tell me -- it looks more vicious than it was.
And you didn't mention your wife's abusive behavior, either.
Was he ever violent with you or the children?
So yes, I may have gotten a little rowdy with her, okay.
I didn't say you were violent to me.

This is the first time I've done anything violent in my life.
